Following are the options when right clicking a Part in the Part View:

Save To Library -  See the  Assembly Level Save To Library  topic for more
        information. 
 
 
 Edit Shape -  See the  Assembly Level Edit Shape  topic for more information. 
 
 
 Edge Band -  See the  Assembly Level Edge Band  topic for more information. 
 
 
 Edit Splits -  See the  Assembly Level Edit Splits  topic for more information. 
 
 
 
 To Drawing -  See the  Room Level To Drawing  topic for more information. 
 
 
 To Live Drawing -  See the  Room Level To Live Drawing         topic for more information. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Properties -  See the  Assembly Level Properties  topic for more information.

        information.
